name: Law Offices of Michael Y. Lo Reviews

review.title: “Not bad”
review.pros: Pros – Understanding clients situation. Air conditioned office. Friendly staff. Clean and modern looking office. Respectable attorney with almost 30 years worth of experience.
review.cons: Cons – An office enviroment can get pretty boring sometimes. Always on computer so my eyes get sore. Sometimes very busy and sometimes very slow.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give more perks, and more team building exercises so that life is not so monotonous all the time. Giveout more positive feedback more often.
